channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical -- MicroK8s
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical -- MicroK8s

item.title: CVE-2019-15789|2024-08-05T00:56:22.452Z -- canonical -- microk8s
item.description: Privilege escalation vulnerability in MicroK8s allows a low privilege user with local access to obtain root access to the host by provisioning a privileged container. Fixed in MicroK8s 1.15.3.
